title: cryptoyogibo
author: cryptoyogibo
content: We are pleased to announce a joint trade quest with our partners Symbiosis and Rango.Exchange. The contest is dedicated to the FIFA World Cup 2023.The prize pool is 500 USDTüèÜ1st place: 300 $üèÜ2nd place: 150 $üèÜGiveaway: 50 $ RT, Tag 2 friends and guess the score in the final FIFA game. Answers will be accepted before the start of the match.üöÄSpecial Prize: The user who completes the quest and makes the largest swap in trading volume will receive NFT Uroboros Co-Builder. The minimum trading volume in this case must be: $10,000Quest dates: 12 December 2022 ‚Äì 19 December 2022.The winners will be announced on 20 December 2022.Quest conditions:Complete all the quest tasks #World Cup with partners : https://uroborosdefi.crew3.xyz/questboard :The 2 winners (1st and 2nd place) will be randomly chosen amongst the users who will have completed all the quest tasks.The winner of the Giveaway will be randomly chosen amongst users who guessed the score and made an RT announcing the quest.Mechanics of the quest on crew3:Follow Twitter Symbiosis + Rango Exchange + Uroboros.Retweet and comment ‚Äî Quest Announcement Post https://twitter.com/uroborosdefi/status/1602321148422791170Follow the Symbiosis Announcements TG https://t.me/symbiosis_announcementsFollow the Uroboros Discord (https://discord.gg/MpTqKFxsFA)Follow the Rango.Exchange TG https://t.me/rangoexchangeFollow the Symbiosis TG https://t.me/symbiosis_financeFollow the Uroboros TG https://t.me/uroborosdefichatSwap on Rango Exchange (Attach confirmation screen + transaction id). Any cross-chain trade with a minimum transaction amount of $50Swap on Symbiosis (Attach confirmation screen + transaction id). Any cross-chain trade with a minimum transaction amount of $50Important note: Use Crew3 to complete the quest or your points will not be protected.Good luck to the community! Be honest and persistent!https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*KVEbNMr8oPolyTbwvQPVRQ.webp
